titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on 9,10-Anthracenedione.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on 9,10-Anthracenedione.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the heading of a specified chemical to provide for the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures of 2-tert-amyl 9, 10 anthraquinone (CAS No. 32588-54-8) and 2-iso-amyl-9, 10-anthraquinone (CAS No. 68892-28-4).
